author: By Nigel Thompson
title: Late holiday deals: Last minute bargain city breaks, cruises, long and short-haul sunshine
text:
CITY BREAKS
Istanbul – 5nts B&B at the 4* Radisson Blu Hotel and Spa from £287pp inc flights from Manchester on Aug 4. 020 8705 0107.
Prague – fly from Newcastle on Aug 7 for 3nts B&B at the 3* Hotel Globus. From £295pp based on 3 sharing. 0800 408 5594.
Rome – 3nts B&B at the 4* Marc Aurelio hotel from £236pp. Depart from Gatwick on Aug 11. 020 3001 0608.
CRUISE
Marmaris sailing - 7nts round trip Ancient Wonders itinerary on Thomson Spirit from £582pp. Calls at Istanbul, Bozcaada, and Kusadasi, Turkey; Piraeus and Santorini, Greece. Based on 2 sharing and flying from Manchester on Aug 17 inc transfers, tips and service charges. 0871 230 2800.
La Spezia sailing – MSC Divina's 7nts round trip itinerary on Sept 13, 2015, calls at Cannes, France; Palma and Barcelona, Spain; and Naples and Civitavecchia, Italy. From £699pp inc flights from London with British Airways and transfers plus free ‘Fantastica’ upgrade (breakfast in cabin and 24hr room service). 020 3426 3010.
LONG HAUL
Barbados – 7nts B&B at 3* Time Out Hotel in St Lawrence Gap from £701pp inc flights from Manchester on Aug 31. 0800 2800212.
Mauritius – depart from Manchester with Emirates between Sept 10-21 for 7nts h/b at the 3* Coin De Mire Attitude hotel from £989pp (saves £257pp). Book by Aug 31. Quote: ref 2731634. 0800 258 5773.
Cuba – 7nts a/i at the 4* Memories Jibacoa at Arroyo Bermejo Beach from £995pp (based on 2 sharing, saves up to £130pp). Fly from Gatwick on Sept 28 inc transfers. 0344 557 3859.
SHORT HAUL
Turkey – fly from Heathrow on Aug 8 for 7nts a/i at Mark Warner’s Sea Garden Resort near Bodrum from £995pp (saves £480pp; child from £835). Inc transfers, watersports and fitness programmes.
Italy – 7nts B&B twin centre in Puglia from £995pp with 3nts at the 5* Risorgimento Resort in Lecce then 4nts at the 4* Masseria Montelauro near Otranto from £1,000pp inc flights from Manchester on Aug 26 with easyJet and car hire. 01293 731 753.
